ygData.subject: Re: Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
ygData.msgSnippet: If it s on a roaming barb in everfrost my guess would have to be Karg Icebear.  He s killable by a group of 40 s I believe maybe alittle less. He s got 2-3
ygData.messageBody:
If it's on a roaming barb in everfrost my guess would have to be Karg
Icebear. He's killable by a group of 40's I believe maybe alittle less.
He's got 2-3 other VERY nice items on him, so he may even be higher than
that. All I know is my highest level bard is 20th and he's still WAY
red..

Chris Benco
Manager of Technical Support X Technology Inc.
Bash@... - (440)498-1222 x111

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nick Morgowicz [SMTP:nomorgow@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 7:44 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
>
> From: Nick Morgowicz <nomorgow@...>
>
> Heya, i just saw this latest addition to gameznet and it looked very
> interesting. With 18dmg, 39 delay, and glowing like a greater
> lighstone, this two handed sword is calling to be my replacement for
> the
> AGI stealing BBC. Thing is though, the website only said it would be
> found on a roaming barbarian in everfrost. Does anyone know which
> barbarian has it? My drow warrior is already KOS there, so it's no
> big
> deal if i kill a few barbarians :)
>
> To John - I didn't catch you on last eve. Hopefully tonight after
> work
> we can get together and share stories. I was in Guk and Cazic but
> I'll
> go anywhere really :)
>
> Nick
